page.title: 13Orwell Children's Gala
page.content: Every year on the first Saturday in June a{Gala}is held for the children of Milnathort. A parade,led by Kinross & District Pipe Band, leaves the school at one o'clock and marches through the village streets to the Donaldson Park. Races are then held. First prize is 20p, second prize 15p and third prize 10p. At about 3 pm a pentathlon is held to decide who is to be the{Gala Queen}and who is to be the {Courtier. }After this, bags of sweets and food are given out and everyone goes home. In the evening a{fancy dress parade leaves the school and marches to Hay's Market. It is judged in age groups by invited local people, and everyone is given a prize. Outside,the floats line up to receive their prizes. Later that evening a dance for the adults is held in a local hotel.
